page.title: 05Soccer Club
page.content: Parkend A.F.C. is in the first division of the North Gloucestershire League, and finished fifth in the 1984/85 season.Only three of the players actually live in the village, but a couple more do have family connections with Parkend.Home games have about 10 regular spectators at their home games on the Playing Field in the centre of the village.Players' cars are used as transport to away matches to other villages, mainly in the Forest, the furthest team visited being in Gloucester. The club is currently working on plans for new changing quarters and showers.Funds are raised by holding stalls at the village Carnival sponsored events and a harvest festival.
